snippet: Colin Furze, a garage inventor and do-it-yourself daredevil from England, is a high school dropout who harnessed the powers of the X-Men superheroes to become a YouTube star.
abstract: Colin Furze, garage inventor and do-it-yourself daredevil in Stamford, England, has found online following for his YouTube videos of radical, and sometimes dangerous, inventions; Furze, a high school dropout and plumber, has gained most notoriety by replicating powers displayed by characters in X-Men movie franchise.
lead_paragraph: Colin Furze, a garage inventor and do-it-yourself daredevil from England, is a high school dropout who harnessed the powers of the X-Men superheroes to become a YouTube star.

headline.seo: Colin Furze Reinvents X-Men Characters, Claws and All
headline.main: The X-Man Next Door, Claws and All
headline.print_headline: The X-Man Next Door, Claws and All
